section:
Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Interfaces.ITextEditorSymbol Interface Reference Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Interfaces.ITextEditorSymbol Inheritance diagram for Luthetus.TextEditor.RazorLib.CompilerServices.Interfaces.ITextEditorSymbol:
Properties
TextEditorTextSpan TextSpan [get]
SyntaxKind SyntaxKind [get]
string SymbolKindString [get]
SymbolKindString is not an Enum here. This is because ITextEditorSymbol is a class within the Text Editor library; every enum would have to be specified by the library itself. So, (2023-07-20) this hacky string based SymbolKindString is going to be used for now. This allows the consumer of the Text Editor library to add further SymbolKind(s) of their choosing.
